name: The Otherworldly Wingman
description:
Damien just  wants nothing more than to go into a successful date with Ally, but little did he know that the fate of his date(and perhaps his life) was in your hands...

This game was made for the Extra Credits Game Jam, and it's still unfinished. But I will be updating it as frequently as possible.

Special Credits:

Sprites by Konnet

Backgrounds by Uncle Mugen

Music by Kevin Mecleud and Purple Planet Music

Writing by Me :D
